mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store.data.visibility

Class FieldLevelVisibilityWriter<T,CommonIndexValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store.data.visibility.FieldLevelVisibilityWriter<T,CommonIndexValue>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    CommonIndexValue -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>, FieldWriter<T,CommonIndexValue>

    public class FieldLevelVisibilityWriter<T,CommonIndexValue>
extends Object
implements FieldWriter<T,CommonIndexValue>
    Wrapper for a writer to extract the overriding column level visibility for each specific attribute.
